data.title: Big Data Goes to Hollywood: The Emergence of Big Data as a Tool in the American Film Industry
data.meta_description: Big data techniques are increasingly used in marketing and to inform business decisions. The film industry is one area where big data that analyzes social media is being used to predict the popularity of films and to gauge audience interest. This is also an area...
